title: YAPE!!!

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Do yape things, like jumping up and down on a piano!
- Hail the Origami Korigami!
- Mess up paper in ways only Yape can do!

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are stronger than an anime swordsman!
- You are more efficient than all other supplies tenfold, making you an essential purchase from Office Depot!
- You are worth 1000 tapes, like $4790 at Staples
- **"Wait we still dont know what Yape does!":** The host determines what any of these abilities even do at the beginning of the game

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you

desc:
Post 5419
*The most powerful of all office supplies! "Wait what do you do?"*
